title: 玩家发送信息时后台报错,应该是和Essentials有关的
author: 城雨
txt_content:
发送信息前会报错[21:06:43 ERROR]: Could not pass event AsyncPlayerChatEvent to Essentials v2.0.1-b342
org.bukkit.event.EventException

[21:06:43 INFO]: [和谐岛]<NewPlayer> 2复制代码

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 还是，尝试安装一个权限组插件

replies.txt_content:
